headline: Exclusive Thought Leadership Event TLFT 2026 Returns to New York City
summary: iResearch Services, a leading global B2B thought leadership agency, has announced the return of Thought Leadership for Tomorrow (TLFT) 2026, the premier invite-only event for senior decision-makers shaping the future of thought leadership. In its fourth-year running, and following the success of TLFT 2025, which convened over 100 industry leaders and 27 speakers from organizations including Google, Morgan Stanley, Salesforce, LinkedIn, IBM, KPMG, and Deloitte, the 2026 event promises an even mor

thumbnail.caption: Yogesh Shah, CEO of iResearch Services, delivers the opening keynote at Thought Leadership for Tomorrow (TLFT) 2025 in New York City.

headline: This is the most under-owned megacap tech stock, according to Morgan Stanley
summary: Investing.com -- In a note to clients on Wednesday, Morgan Stanley analysts revealed the most under-owned megacap technology stock.

headline: A Look At IBM (IBM) Valuation As Short Seller Critique Sparks Fresh Doubts On Its AI Direction
summary: International Business Machines (IBM) stock has come under pressure after high profile short seller Jim Chanos questioned the company’s artificial intelligence focus, criticizing an emphasis on marketing and consulting instead of core technology development. See our latest analysis for International Business Machines. The recent criticism has landed during a weak patch for the stock, with a 7 day share price return of an 11.46% decline and a 30 day share price return of a 15.49% decline...
